post:
ProvisionHost.com
http://provisionhost.com

LEB Posting: http://www.lowendbox.com/blog/provisionhost-6-45-256mb-openvz-vps-in-dallas/

Provision Host is an established web hosting provider that offers top of the line quality services at a reasonable cost. We specialize in providing superior products and excellent support to strive for our goal of 100% customer satisfaction.

_PHVPS.5 Plan
Cost: **$5.00 /mo with promotional code "LET"**
256MB RAM
10GB Disk Space
250GB Bandwidth
SolusVM Control Panel
IRC and VPN allowed upon request_

We offer a complete VPS solution with different configurations to match your specific requirements. All servers are virtualized with OpenVZ, hosted on enterprise class hardware and located in government class datacenters. All major Linux distributions are available to install (Cent OS, Ubuntu, Debian, Fedora).

If you have any questions you may contact us at any time.

E-mail: sales[@]provisionhost.com
Skype: ph-brandon
